sentences.en: Eleven o'clock, approve the sketches for the toy spaceship.
sentences.cn: 十一点钟, 批示玩具太空船的草图.

sentences.en: In future, astronauts will be required to descend from a spaceship while it is still in space and return to it.
sentences.cn: 将来, 宇航员应当能从依然在太空中的宇宙飞船中下来,并且能够回到飞船里去.

sentences.en: In future, astronauts will be required to descend from a spaceship while it is still in space and to return to it.
sentences.cn: 将来, 将要求宇航员从停在太空里的飞船中下来并且能回到飞船中去.

sentences.en: It is glowing like a spaceship in purlieus of Drayton Park.
sentences.cn: 它像一艘太空船一样在德雷顿公园的边缘闪闪发光；

sentences.en: Let's pretend we're on the spaceship orbiting round the earth!
sentences.cn: 让我们假装是在沿轨道绕地球运转的宇宙飞船上!

sentences.en: Someone has stolen the secret formula for the liquid that fires our new spaceship.
sentences.cn: 有人偷了我们发射太空船所用的液体燃料的秘方.

sentences.en: The spaceship is already being counted down.
sentences.cn: 宇宙飞船已开始倒数计时了.

sentences.en: The spaceship made a safe landing on the moon.
sentences.cn: 宇宙飞船在月球上安全着陆.

sentences.en: The spaceship made a successful reentry into the Earth's atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 宇宙飞船成功地重返大气层。
他们发射了一艘宇宙飞船.

sentences.en: They shot the spaceship up into the sky.
They were filled with wonder when they saw the spaceship.
sentences.cn: 当他们看到宇宙飞船时,他们非常惊奇.

sentences.en: Yet another spaceship has been sent up recently.
sentences.cn: 最近又发射了一艘宇宙飞船.

trans.tran_en: a vehicle for carrying people through space
